subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dan Uggla hit a tie-breaking home run off Roy Halladay in the eighth inning to cap a productive afternoon, and host Atlanta beat Philadelphia to win twice in the three-game series.
snippet: Dan Uggla hit a tie-breaking home run off Roy Halladay in the eighth inning to cap a productive afternoon, and host Atlanta beat Philadelphia to win twice in the three-game series.
